food.question: I am yellow and you peel me to eat me. Monkeys like me a lot! What am I?
I am round and red. I grow on a tree. You can eat me whole or in juice. What am I?

hints.text: 🥤 You can drink me as juice.

food.question: I am white and cold. I'm sweet. Kids love to eat me in a cone. What am I?

hints.text: 🍦 You can eat me with a spoon.

food.question: I am orange and crunchy. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?
I am long and green. You can eat me in a salad. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I am mostly made of water.

food.question: I am small and round. I can be green, red or purple. What am I?

hints.text: 🍷 You can make juice out of me.

food.question: I'm a yummy snack that's crunchy and salty. You can eat me at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 I am made from a yellow vegetable.
🎬 People eat me at the movie theater.

food.question: I am orange and you can make a yummy drink out of me! What am I?

hints.text: 🍹 People drink my juice in the morning.

food.question: I am made of flour and you can put toppings on me, like cheese and pepperoni. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am cooked in an oven.
🧀 I often have cheese on top.

food.question: I am a breakfast food. I am made from eggs and I am yellow. What am I?

hints.text: 🍳 I am cooked in a pan.
🥚 You need eggs to make me.

cosmos.question: I am big and bright, and I come out at night. I help you see when it's dark. What am I?

hints.text: 🌚 You see me when the sun goes away

cosmos.question: I am hot and yellow and give you light all day. What am I?

hints.text: 😎 You can't look straight at me

cosmos.question: I am a big ball of rock and water, and you live here. What am I?

hints.text: 🌍 It's where you are right now!

cosmos.question: I am a bright light far away, twinkling in the night sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🌃 You can see lots of me at night

cosmos.question: Sometimes the moon looks round, sometimes it's a little sliver. What do we call the round moon?

hints.text: 🍕 It looks like a whole pizza
🌙 It's the opposite of a new moon.

cosmos.question: I am a red planet. Robots drive around on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I am sometimes called the Red Planet

cosmos.question: I am a big, cold ball of gas, and I have pretty rings around me. What am I?

hints.text: 💍 I am known for my rings
💨 My rings are made of ice and rock

cosmos.question: What do we call the group of stars that make a picture in the sky?
What do we call it when the moon passes between the Earth and the Sun, blocking the Sun's light?

hints.text: 🌑 Everything gets darker during the day
🌙 The moon is hiding the sun.
🕶️ You need special glasses to see it safely

cosmos.question: What is the name for a rock flying in space that enters Earth's atmosphere and burns up, making a bright streak of light?

hints.text: 🌠 People make wishes when they see one
☄️ It is also called a shooting star
🔥 It gets very hot as it falls.
